channel.title: How to get everyone to spawn in my server?
channel.description:
Hey i wanted to know how i can have everyone in my server spawn things.And how i can make some items disabled for certain type of ranks to spawn. THX! :)
EDIT: I wanted to also ask about this,what did i do wrong here? I just dont want to make new post because i feel that im spamming :P
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/163/6an5.png/][IMG]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/8960/6an5.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]

item.title: How to get everyone to spawn in my server?
item.dc:creator: @crazyfazespy crazyfazespy
item.description:
@crazyfazespy wrote:

if ((newItemID <= 30000) && (newItemID >= 0) && !c.getPA().randomUnspawn()) {

ahh i thought it, try this

if ((newItemID <= 30000 && !c.getPA().randomUnspawn()) && (newItemID >= 0 && !c.getPA().randomUnspawn())) {

if you still get commands.java error, then it mean i did samthing wrong agen, and i dont see other logical fix(my knowledge of java is very limited)

PS maby sameone already did this, so it would be cool if you could help this guy

EDIT: i see your misstake at compiler…

make sure this line looks exactly same: if ((newItemID <= 30000) && (newItemID >= 0) && !c.getPA().randomUnspawn()) {

cuz in compiler i see this:
if ((newItemID <= 30000) && (newItemID >= 0)) && !c.getPA().randomUnspawn()) {
^ two of those at center of line “))” you closed line to early

Read full topic

item.source: How to get everyone to spawn in my server?

item.title: How to get everyone to spawn in my server?
item.dc:creator: @imback4more imback4more
item.description:
@imback4more wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) { if(c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("<shad=16745472>[Server]</col><shad=65288> You can not spawn item in wildy!"); return; } try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 0) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); for(int i : c.canSpawn) { if(i == newItemID) { c.sendMessage("<shad=16745472>[Server]</col><shad=65288> "+ Config.OWNER +" Has disabled this item from being spawned."); return; } } if ((newItemID <= 30000) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist."); } } else { c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex::item_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))"); }

That’s how my ::item spawning looks like,wut do i change there? every number with a digit i changed to 0 but nothing o-o

Read full topic
item.source: How to get everyone to spawn in my server?

item.title: How to get everyone to spawn in my server?
item.dc:creator: @crazyfazespy crazyfazespy
item.description:
@crazyfazespy wrote:

!playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("::item “)
this command should look like this
playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(”::item ")

without "!"
look at this more you should find another, maby its not item but pickup, anyway

EDIT:

Find command like this:

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("pickup") && c.playerRights >= 2) {
			try {
				String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
				if (args.length == 3) {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
					if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
						c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);		
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("No such item.");
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("Use as ::pickup 995 200");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				
			}
		}

also i have idea how to help you, might work (im sure of that 80%)

First of all find this in player assistant

public static int Barrows[] =

then bellow this add:

public static int Unspawn[] = {4151,4153};// whip and g maul

then you should see this:

public int randomBarrows() {
	return Barrows[(int)(Math.random()*Barrows.length)];
}

bellow it add:

public int randomUnsapwn() {
	return Unspawn[(int)(Math.random()*Unspawn.length)];
}

then open your commans.java

and replace your ::item or ::pickup command with this:

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("pickup") && c.playerRights >= 0) {
			try {
				String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
				if (args.length == 3) {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
					if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0) && !c.getPA().randomUnspawn()) {
						c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);		
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("You cant spawn that.");
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("Use as ::pickup 995 200");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				
			}
		}

if you get any error pleasse reply, it might be, i did some minnor misstake, couse i dont have jdk i cant test it so…

Read full topic
